# Update Azure Shapes Skill - Quick Reference

**Purpose:** Update azure_shapes.py with the latest Azure icons from DrawIO repository.

See [SKILL.md](SKILL.md) for detailed instructions on how GitHub Copilot uses this skill.

## Quick Start

Ask Copilot to update:

> Update the Azure shapes from DrawIO

## Files

- **[SKILL.md](SKILL.md)** - Complete instructions for GitHub Copilot
- **[analyze_icons.py](analyze_icons.py)** - Script to compare DrawIO vs current shapes
- **README.md** - This file

## DrawIO Repository

Icons: https://github.com/jgraph/drawio/tree/dev/src/main/webapp/img/lib/azure2/
